title: STF arrest suspect from Fort with heroin worth over 4 million
content: The Police Special Task Force (STF) has arrested a person in possession of heroin worth around Rs. 4 million. The raid was carried out based on information received by the Special Raid Unit at the STF Headquarters. The suspect was arrested from Malwatta Road in Fort with 248 grams of heroin. The victim is a 53 year old resident of Colombo 11. He has been handed over to the Police Narcotics Bureau for further investigations.
